body.name: GPS7000 -G1-4G LTE- GPS Vehicle Tracker - Hidden Tracking Device for Any Vehicle - Easy Installation in The Vehicle Battery - Waterproof - Friendly Monitoring Platform - Includes 12 Months of Service

features: Easy to Install: Enjoy a swift and hassle-free installation process with the GPS7000 G1. This GPS tracker seamlessly connects to your vehicle's battery through a straightforward 2-wire setup, ensuring a smooth integration process. It's incredibly easy to install—just connect it directly to your vehicle's battery terminal, and you're ready to start tracking. Say goodbye to complicated installations or wiring hassles!

Flexible Subscription: Enjoy the advantages of an affordable monthly subscription at USD 11.90, with the freedom to cancel at any time. Transparent pricing ensures no undisclosed fees, providing a cost-effective solution for your GPS tracking needs. No Contract, No Hidden Fees – Cancel Anytime.

Real-Time Monitoring: Track your vehicle's location with GPS7000 G1 for instant updates. Access speed, geofencing, and driving reports through the user-friendly web or mobile app, ensuring seamless control and efficient fleet management.

Efficient Power Usage and Weatherproof Reliability: The GPS7000 G1 boasts low power consumption by drawing directly from your vehicle's battery, ensuring reliable operation. Compatible with 12- or 24VDC voltage ranges in most vehicles. Its IP65 waterproof rating and durable materials make it resilient against all weather conditions. The included Velcro facilitates discreet device concealment, providing a robust and weatherproof solution for your tracking needs.

Eco-Driving & Wide Range Tracking: The GPS7000 G1 offers a range of advanced features to help you improve your driving style and reduce environmental pollution. It covers all states in the USA, Mexico, and Canada, and works with all telcos in the USA. Get daily, weekly, and monthly reports to help you optimize your fleet's performance.
body.description: GPS7000 - G1-4G LTE - GPS Vehicle Tracker - Hidden tracking device for any vehicle - Easy installation in the vehicle battery - Waterproof - With geofence alarm system - Includes 12 months of service Introducing the GPS7000 G1, a cutting-edge 4G LTE device designed for efficient fleet management. With seamless installation and powerful features, it provides real-time, high-precision location data. Equipped with built-in internal antennas and a water-resistant design (IP65 compliant), this device ensures durability for long-lasting fleet management. Beyond location tracking, it features a built-in accelerometer, offering benefits such as trip detection, driving behavior analysis, and location-based turns—ideal for insurance telematics, rental services, leasing, and light vehicle fleets. As an added advantage, it offers a 10-day free trial, allowing ample time to test its capabilities before committing. Choose for reliable, efficient fleet management and experience the results firsthand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: So far it works great. Useful to keep an eye on our teen who likes to disable tracking on his phone. It seems to be accurate and I like the report features. The notifications are great too if he's doing or going places he shouldn't be. Customer service has been great too. Pedro with technical support reached out to say hi and introduce himself after I activated it. I asked a question about the reporting and he was quick and thorough with a response. Installation was easy enough. Teen is mechanically inclined so I had to be sneeky. Just add power and ground and it was good to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to monitor my motorcycle while it's being rented on Riders Share. I looked at quite a few trackers, but all of them had some kind of flaw. One of them was very similar to this GPS7000 tracker, but cost over $300 and had to be shipped from Europe. I was skeptical of this purchase and even bought another alternative in case this didn't live up to my expectations. Thankfully, and unless something changes later, I believe this hard-wired tracker to be the best bang for the buck.-Pros:Very very inexpensive. Not only is the device cheap, the subscription (along with the 10 day free trial which is cool) is one of the cheapest monthy fees for these types of trackers.Very easy to install and get up and running through the website. There's even an app available for Android and Apple devices!Fast updates, I think somewhere around 30 second intervals, more than enough for my needs. This includes some telemetry data including speed, distance, time. The data reporting can also be customized to show stops, parking/idles, initial and final positions, and speeding which is adjustable.You can setup daily/weekly/monthly reports to your email as well as set up notifications on when there's movement, speeding, electrical disconnection, or exiting geofences.A cool feature that I didn't know it included is the ability to show when the ignition is on and the voltage of the battery. I'm not sure if an alarm can be setup for when the battery gets below a threshold, but I imagine there's a way.-Cons:There is a montly fee, so you're purchasing a device that will need service. I'm not sure which network it's on, but it works in rural areas for me.Indoors reception (in a garage) is non-existent. I'm not sure how tunnels or parking garages fare but I imagine not very well. I have this behind plastic so there shouldn't be any interference. Outside with a clear view to the sky I usually hover around 30 connected satellites.This being a small business, I'm not sure how long the app/web portal will be available. It's here today, but might be gone tomorrow.I'm not sure how much this will drain the battery over time. I'll have to do some additional testing and see.-So I watched the included video and saw "gosafe" on the device. But when I looked the brand up it came back with devices that are quite expensive for both the tracker and the subscription. When I opened the package, it does indeed say "gosafe" and I believe these may have been bought wholesale. They shipped from Florida and digging into the backend shows these are GPS tracking and IoT solutions through gurtam.com. The app looks like a rebrand of Wialon.If you're looking for a cheap tracker that can be wired to a vehicle, this might be one of the best options out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was a little concerned when it first arrived because the instructions were not very clear. But after figuring out they will send you your sign in information by email it worked pretty well. Very easy to install. It also at least so far is working and pretty accurate and real time. I would buy another one tomorrow. Just need some better instructions on how the process works would help.Update: overall it’s been a week and the unit is working pretty well. It’s close enough to live for me even when you might have some minimal delay with updating. I mean like 39 seconds or a minute or so delay. For the cost of the unit and monthly charge I can easily deal with that…overall I’m impressed with the unit and the customer service. I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase more from them.
